heroIntro: This exceptional 3-bedroom penthouse represents the pinnacle of sophisticated coastal living on the Costa Blanca. Located in the prestigious Playa La Fossa district of Calpe, this property exemplifies the refined taste and exclusivity that discerning buyers seek. At €899,000, you're acquiring a premium specification residence positioned 20% below comparable properties in neighbouring Jávea, offering remarkable value within the luxury market segment. The 134m² of meticulously designed living space captures the essence of Mediterranean elegance, offering the perfect sanctuary for those who appreciate quality, privacy, and prestige. With 27 high-resolution images documenting every detail, this penthouse showcases the architectural excellence and contemporary finishes that define luxury living in one of Spain's most coveted coastal destinations. Calpe's booming property market, experiencing consistent 7% year-on-year growth, positions this acquisition as both a lifestyle choice and a sophisticated investment opportunity for international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean sophistication without the inflated pricing of neighbouring zones.
areaSection: Calpe, positioned dramatically on the Costa Blanca between the iconic Peñón d'Ifach and the Mediterranean Sea, represents one of Spain's most geographically stunning coastal municipalities. The town's distinctive topography creates natural protection and exclusive positioning for premium properties. Known for its Blue Flag beaches, crystalline waters, and year-round temperate climate averaging 300 days of sunshine annually, Calpe combines authentic Spanish charm with cosmopolitan amenities. The region's transformation into a thriving expatriate destination has maintained careful development standards, preserving the natural beauty that attracted international investors and residents. Unlike overcrowded alternatives, Calpe maintains a sophisticated balance between accessibility and exclusivity, with excellent infrastructure including modern healthcare, international education facilities, and diverse dining establishments. The town's position offers convenient access to major regional attractions while maintaining the peaceful, refined atmosphere that luxury buyers increasingly demand.
lifestyleSection: Living in Calpe as a luxury resident means embracing a lifestyle where Mediterranean authenticity meets contemporary convenience. The strong expatriate community—particularly British and German families—has cultivated an environment where English is widely spoken, international services thrive, and sophisticated social networks flourish naturally. Daily life revolves around access to pristine beaches, world-class golf facilities within minutes, and an impressive selection of fine dining establishments catering to discerning palates. The weekly markets showcase fresh Mediterranean produce, while major supermarkets provide international selections. Healthcare access is exceptional, with private clinics staffed by English-speaking physicians and comprehensive emergency services. Cultural experiences range from art galleries to archaeological sites, while the emerging TRAM connection promises enhanced regional connectivity. Residents enjoy a refined pace where cosmopolitan amenities support rather than dominate daily rhythms, creating an ideal environment for those seeking work-life balance without sacrificing quality services or social engagement.

healthcare.text: Healthcare access in Calpe meets international standards with multiple service levels available. Private clinics throughout the region employ English-speaking physicians and specialists, offering convenient consultations without language barriers. Hospital de Dénia, 30 minutes distant, provides comprehensive emergency and specialist services. The local Centro de Salud Calp handles routine care and emergency stabilization. International residents particularly appreciate the established medical protocols familiar to British and Northern European patients. Private health insurance integrates seamlessly with local providers, and medical tourism infrastructure ensures sophisticated treatment options. Pharmaceutical services match international standards, with English-speaking pharmacists available throughout the town.
